topics.body:
I don't normally say this, but the justices that ruled this need to drop dead already. . hard cause the arguments for siding with hobby lobby by the five justices didn't make a lick of sense rationally.

The entire arguments by those five justices summarized in one sentence, "Christian rights supersede everyone else's rights and business owner's rights supersede everyone else's rights".

To put it simply:  If you're not-christian/a woman your rights don't mean shit.

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b2254c6368726960e60100#post_53b2254c6368726960e60100
[bq="gasmaskangel"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b222bd63687267805b0100#post_53b222bd63687267805b0100
I just vomited out of pure rage and disgust. What the fucking fuck is this goddamn bullshit?![/bq]
The conservative justices in the supreme court today unanimously with the supreme court case about hobby lobby that a business owner's religious beliefs supersede individual's rights.

What is probably going to get the axe within the next couple of months as well:  Blood transfusions for violating "religious freedom", vaccines, antidepressants and anesthesia.

If you're a company and you don't want to with the company insurance pay for blood transfusions you could theoretically file a lawsuit saying it violates your religious freedom.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b224d0636872699de20100#post_53b224d0636872699de20100

Businesses and religions have the right to associate with whomever they wish.
Last time I checked women weren't entitled to birth control as a human right.
And if Birth Control is against doctrine they don't have to supply it.

I would argue that freedom is more important than "I exist therefore I am owed" positive rights which are antithetical to the liberty this country was based on (negative rights)

Freedom of assocation > muh condoms.

But whatever, my issues run deeper than one ruling so maybe in the paradigm set up it was a bad decision.
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b224d0636872699de20100#post_53b224d0636872699de20100

Where is this
!http://www.myimportstore.com/images/product/death_note_notebook_2_large-i246-242.jpg!
When you need it?

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b224d0636872699de20100#post_53b224d0636872699de20100
I've mentioned this in the religion general thread, but shit like this fucking enrages me. Its like they're taking one of the things that makes the States worthwhile and just wiping their fucking asses with it.

It almost feels like a personal insult. I and far too many others fucking bled for this goddamn country and the ideals it alleged to respect and this is how they fucking repay that, by assaulting the foundations of freedom.

You know, I used to shop at hobby lobby. I still draw and they have art supplies. Fucking never again. Fuck, those shitbags probably don't want my dirty bisexual atheist money anyways so far be it from me to fucking inconvenience them.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7
